bug.author: lcy-seso
bug.summary: pre-commit hook accidentally removed context of python model config in C-API demos.
bug.description: The context python model config for C-API demos is removed by the pre-commit hook. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/blob/develop/paddle/capi/examples/model_inference/dense/trainer_config.py>https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/blob/develop/paddle/capi/examples/model_inference/dense/trainer_config.py</denchmark-link>
